full_text: ** BELLSOUTH ** (BST,A00100) JEFFREY EPSTEIN Page 7 Account Number: 561 832-4117 Bill Period Date: Mar 5, 2005 908 0450 Messages (continued) Returned Check Policy Notice An important part of BellSouth's commitment to our valued customers is keeping you informed of policies that may affect your account. If a check is returned to BellSouth from your financial institution, a returned check fee up to the amount permitted by law may be charged to your account. DON'T MISS YOUR DIRECTORY CLOSING DEADLINE BellSouth will soon be reprinting telephone directories for the following areas: Havana (06 01 05), Lake City (06 21 05), Miami and Homestead (06 07 05), Palatka (06 16 05), St. Augustine (06 21 05), and West Palm Beach (06 01 05) directories will be reprinted on the dates shown. If you want to change, add or delete listings, please call your BellSouth Service Representative before the reprint deadline shown above. Certain charges may apply. Additionally, residential subscribers can request a dual-name listing (example: Bob and Carol Jones). Please call your BellSouth Service Representative today at 1 888 757 6500 (residence) or 1 866 620 6000 (business), before your area's directory is reprinted. After the closing date indicated above, you'll have to wait another year before changes can be made. Thank you for choosing BellSouth for your communications needs. Visit us on the Internet: www.bellsouth.com 07/26/17 Page 103 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031635

BellSouth will soon be reprinting telephone directories for the following areas: Havana (06 01 05), Lake City (06 21 05), Miami and Homestead (06 07 05), Palatka (06 16 05), St. Augustine (06 21 05), and West Palm Beach (06 01 05) directories will be reprinted on the dates shown. If you want to change, add or delete listings, please call your BellSouth Service Representative before the reprint deadline shown above. Certain charges may apply. Additionally, residential subscribers can request a dual-name listing (example: Bob and Carol Jones).

Please call your BellSouth Service Representative today at 1 888 757 6500 (residence) or 1 866 620 6000 (business), before your area's directory is reprinted.
